title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 206.6 - Hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 206.6 - Hearing

State Regulations
(a) The board may
designate an administrative law judge to conduct a hearing pursuant to Part 212
of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
206.6

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
